# UIDynamicItemCollisionBoundsType.path

**Case**

Path-based collision bounds. For this type, the shape is a [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIBezierPath] object stored in the item’s [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIDynamicItem/collisionBoundingPath] property. See the description of that property for information about how to configure the path itself.

## Declaration

```swift
case path
```

## Constants

- **UIDynamicItemCollisionBoundsType.rectangle**: Rectangular collision bounds.
- **UIDynamicItemCollisionBoundsType.ellipse**: Elliptical collision bounds. The shape of the ellipse is determined by the width and height of the item’s [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIDynamicItem/bounds] property.
